title: Omeruo : Being A Player Of Chelsea Made It Easier To Understand England Stars
content: Speaking in the mixed zone following Nigeria s 2-1 loss to England on Saturday evening, Chelsea defender Kenneth Omeruo has revealed that manager Gernot Rohr informed the players to be prepared to change formation during the friendly. Omeruo was introduced at half-time as replacement for Leon Balogun as Rohr shifted to three at the back, and the former Golden Eaglets star and John Ogu ensured t...
